meanings.sent1: The crowd hoorayed when the team scored a goal.
meanings.sent2: We hoorayed loudly at the end of the performance.
meanings.sent3: The children hoorayed with delight when they saw the magician's trick.
meanings.sent4: The entire town hoorayed in support of the local hero.
meanings.sent5: The fans hoorayed with such energy that the stadium echoed with their cheers.

meanings.definition: To express joy or approval by shouting 'hooray'.
meanings.sent1: She hoorayed with excitement when she won the game.
meanings.sent2: The students hoorayed to celebrate the end of exams.
meanings.sent3: The puppy hoorayed happily when it saw its favorite toy.
meanings.sent4: The audience hoorayed in unison to show their appreciation.
meanings.sent5: The friends hoorayed joyfully as they reached the mountain's summit.
